description: Deletes one rule groups namespace and its associated rule groups definition.

parameters.name: clientToken
parameters.description: A unique identifier that you can provide to ensure the idempotency of the request. Case-sensitive. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the rule groups namespace to delete.

parameters.name: workspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the workspace containing the rule groups namespace and definition to delete.
